scripts.start: npm run bs | npm run watch | npm run sass && npm run js-dependencies
scripts.js-dependencies: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/boostrap.js docs/js/bootstrap.js && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/popper.js
scripts.sass: node-sass src/scss/home.scss docs/css/home.css && node-sass src/scss/students.scss docs/css/students.css && node-sass src/scss/calendar.scss docs/css/calendar.css && node-sass src/scss/home.scss docs/css/home.css -w src/scss | node-sass src/scss/students.scss docs/css/students.css -w src/scss | node-sass src/scss/calendar.scss docs/css/calendar.css -w src/scss
scripts.partials: html-include-comment src/index.html docs/index.html && html-include-comment src/students.html docs/students.html html-include-comment src/calendar.html docs/calendar.html
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run partials && npm run js' src --interval=0.1
